WRITING.TEXT: I bet Marquez is driving a safety car, just to mess up things again.
You're welcome. They're telling safety barriers saved him.
Yes, a Czech was completely unharmed. Driver of semi made out just with a broken jawbone, lost 1.5l blood and that's it.

Driver was unconscious for 4 hours, 80 000 pounds heavy load of salt almost crushed his vehicle. He survived. This is what I call luck.
Pictures from the accident: [http://images.24ur.com/media/images/600xX/Aug2015/61646334.jpg](http://images.24ur.com/media/images/600xX/Aug2015/61646334.jpg) [http://images.24ur.com/media/images/600xX/Aug2015/61646335.jpg](http://images.24ur.com/media/images/600xX/Aug2015/61646335.jpg) [http://images.24ur.com/media/images/600xX/Aug2015/61646333.jpg](http://images.24ur.com/media/images/600xX/Aug2015/61646333.jpg)

WRITING.TITLE: [Slovenia] When semi truck's tire suddenly explodes while driving on the highway!
